selected_quotes: New blood test for breast cancer moves forward with epigenetics. Find the important #openaccess research here
Heard the #breastcancer blood test news today? Here's the research blog
A BRCA1-mutation assoc. DNA methylation signature in blood cells predicts sporadic breast cancer incidence survival
BRCA1-associated methylation signature can predict sporadic breast cancer by Widschwendter et al

citation.abstract: BRCA1 mutation carriers have an 85% risk of developing breast cancer but the risk of developing non-hereditary breast cancer is difficult to assess. Our objective is to test whether a DNA methylation (DNAme) signature derived from BRCA1 mutation carriers is able to predict non-hereditary breast cancer.
citation.title: A BRCA1-mutation associated DNA methylation signature in blood cells predicts sporadic breast cancer incidence and survival
